subject: DEPLOYED: organizerId filter live on TEST
body:
## Deployed to TEST

The organizerId filter is now live on CalendarBEAF-TEST.

## Test It

```
GET https://calendarbeaf-test.azurewebsites.net/api/events?appId=1&organizerId=680669172f9268813021246c
```

Returns events where the organizer is owner, granted, OR alternate.

## Frontend Usage

When RO filters by 'My Events', pass their organizerId:
```javascript
const response = await fetch(`/api/events?appId=1&organizerId=${userOrganizerId}`);
```

Let me know if issues arise!
